A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This nocie is the most un-starwars movie in existance. It is absolutely awful in its execution creating numerous plot holes and laying waste to anticipated characters such as luke skywalker. We learned nearly nothing of the main characters in the film and had 1/2 hr of rose and fin on the casino planet (the most un-starwars moment in the entire film) only to have that part be undermined by he betrayl of the hacker guy. Overall the experince was unimaginative and unenjoyable. If you're after a good starwars sequel rewatch Empire Stirkes Back.
